name: Cleverly Crafted Shelf: Hot Sales Strategy
description: A plain wooden shelf that is mainly used to display the finished fruits of alchemical potioneering.\nIt is said that including a display on which one showcases potions and distributes trial samples during sales is a simple method to promote alchemical potions. After all, the inherent "mystery" of alchemy often leads traders and ordinary people to maintain a certain skepticism toward potions, preferring to simply observe from a distance. If demonstration and trial segments are included in the sales process, people will find it easier to get acquainted with and accept these concoctions...
